name: FancyWords
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fancy words
des:
Add Some Pizzazz to your Vocab!

This is a fun skill that will delight you with the eclectic, the fancy, and the whimsy of the English language. Activate this skill once a day to learn a new and cool word that you can use to spice up your conversation! Some key utterances:

* Definition - get the definition of our fancy word of the day
* Spelling - get the spelling of our fancy word of the day

* Add spice to [word] - have the skill spice up your vocab by providing alternatives to any word you wish
* Give me another one - one alternative not enough? Ask for another one, and we shall deliver

If you enjoyed this skill and want to check out some of my other skills, feel free to checkout my website here:

https://alexa-skill-dev.gitlab.io/alexaWebsite/

Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
